scripts.//: === Set these env vars once per shell or in your CI ===
scripts.//1: export S3_BUCKET=<the EXACT bucket your CloudFront origin uses>
scripts.upload:static:css: aws s3 cp build/static/css/ s3://$S3_BUCKET/static/css/ --recursive --content-type "text/css" --cache-control "public,max-age=31536000,immutable" --metadata-directive replace
scripts.upload:static:js: aws s3 cp build/static/js/ s3://$S3_BUCKET/static/js/ --recursive --content-type "application/javascript" --cache-control "public,max-age=31536000,immutable" --metadata-directive replace
scripts.upload:static:media: aws s3 cp build/static/media/ s3://$S3_BUCKET/static/media/ --recursive --cache-control "public,max-age=31536000,immutable" --metadata-directive replace
scripts.upload:index: aws s3 cp build/index.html s3://$S3_BUCKET/index.html --content-type "text/html" --cache-control "no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate" --metadata-directive replace
scripts.//opt: Optional: common MIME fixes (run once if needed)
scripts.mime:svg: aws s3 cp build/ s3://$S3_BUCKET/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*.svg" --content-type "image/svg+xml" --metadata-directive replace
scripts.mime:json: aws s3 cp build/ s3://$S3_BUCKET/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*.json" --content-type "application/json" --metadata-directive replace
scripts.mime:wasm: aws s3 cp build/ s3://$S3_BUCKET/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*.wasm" --content-type "application/wasm" --metadata-directive replace
scripts.mime:map: aws s3 cp build/ s3://$S3_BUCKET/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*.map" --content-type "application/json" --metadata-directive replace
scripts.deploy: rm -rf build && npm run build && npm run upload:root:other && npm run upload:static:css && npm run upload:static:js && npm run upload:static:media && npm run upload:index && npm run invalidate
